attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: college offers you nvqs in brick work, joinery, electrical and plumbing but do not offer full nvqs as you need site experiance so i beleive it should be made avalible that you do work placemant within these course's as they do with child care and hair dressing. for example use local councils and charitys were possible this will achive two things regenarate our communites and give use the students the expirence we need to become fully quallified
